definition: tone of voice/connotation in intonation/accent (regional etc)/snout/muzzle/lips/protruding portion of an animal's face
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.chinese: “很难判定吗？”我以一种施助的口吻说道。

sentences.english: The boss turned to me and asked in a threating tone .
sentences.chinese: 老板转过身子，以威胁的口吻问我。

sentences.english: She oke as if she did not want to cause him any more trouble.
sentences.chinese: 她说话的口吻似乎表明她不想再给他添更多的麻烦。

sentences.english: I'm not sassing you in Eskimo talk.
sentences.chinese: 我没有用爱斯基摩口吻顶撞你。

sentences.english: "They don't want to settle, " one official said dismissively.
sentences.chinese: “他们不想安顿下来，”一位官员以嘲笑的口吻说道。

sentences.english: He tried to say it dismissively.
sentences.chinese: 他试图表现出轻蔑地口吻。

sentences.english: The clerk said with his best southern planter's accent.
sentences.chinese: 房间登记员以最地道的南部种植园主的口吻回答。

sentences.english: The questions of the driver had the tone of a subtle examination .
sentences.chinese: 司机的问话都含有盘问的口吻。

sentences.english: The foreface tapers from eye to muzzle with a perceptible stop.
sentences.chinese: 前脸从眼睛向口吻方向呈锥形，止部清晰。

sentences.english: This answer came derisively from several places at the same instant.
sentences.chinese: 好几个人都不约而同地以讥讽的口吻作出回答。

sentences.english: The authors play off the concept “time is money” in a very literal sense.
sentences.chinese: 作者以文学化的口吻调侃了“时间即金钱”的概念。

sentences.english: She spoke as if she did not want to cause him any more trouble.
sentences.chinese: 她说话的口吻似乎表明她不想再给他添更多的麻烦。

sentences.english: You liked him'he said accusing ly.
sentences.chinese: “你曾喜欢他，”他以指责的口吻说道。

sentences.english: Do not speak to others in a reprimanding, criticizing way.
sentences.chinese: 不用训斥，指责的口吻跟别人说话。

sentences.english: Thanks to the special personnel are audit said, let a person talent loose a tone.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏特殊说人事部正在审核，让人人才松了一口吻。

sentences.english: Muzzle - The length of the muzzle from nose to stop is slightly shorter than the length from the stop to occiput.
sentences.chinese: 口吻的长度比从止部到后枕骨的距离略短。

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 言辭|言辞[yan2 ci2]
